db.query: CREATE TABLE tblHotkeyProfiles ( _ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, HotkeyName TEXT NOT NULL, HotkeyCombination TEXT NOT NULL, HotkeyGroup TEXT NOT NULL, HotkeyPriority INTEGER NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE sqlitestudio_temp_table AS SELECT * FROM tblPcProfiles;
INSERT INTO tblPcProfiles ( _ID, PcName, PcIP ) SELECT _ID, PcName, PcIP FROM sqlitestudio_temp_table;
